services.name: Home Cleaning
services.description: Professional home cleaning service with eco-friendly products. Our team of expert cleaners will leave your home spotless, using only environmentally safe cleaning agents that are tough on dirt but gentle on your family and pets.

services.name: Lawn Mowing
services.description: Regular lawn maintenance and garden care. Our professional gardeners provide comprehensive lawn services including mowing, edging, fertilizing, and weed control to keep your yard looking its best year-round.

services.name: Computer Repair
services.description: Expert computer repair and maintenance services. Our certified technicians can diagnose and fix hardware issues, remove viruses, recover lost data, and optimize your system for peak performance.

services.name: Math Tutoring
services.description: One-on-one math tutoring for all levels. From elementary arithmetic to advanced calculus, our experienced tutors provide personalized instruction to help students build confidence and improve their grades.

services.name: Physical Therapy
services.description: Specialized physical therapy sessions for recovery. Our licensed therapists create customized rehabilitation programs to help you recover from injuries, manage chronic pain, and restore mobility and function.

services.name: Birthday Party Planning
services.description: Complete birthday party planning and execution. Let us handle everything from venue selection and decorations to entertainment and catering, ensuring a memorable celebration for your special day.

services.name: Plumbing Services
services.description: Professional plumbing repairs and installations. Our licensed plumbers can handle everything from leaky faucets and clogged drains to complex pipe installations and water heater replacements.

services.name: Dog Walking
services.description: Regular dog walking services for busy pet owners. Our reliable pet care professionals will ensure your furry friend gets the exercise they need with scheduled walks tailored to your pet's energy level and needs.

services.name: Yoga Classes
services.description: Private and group yoga instruction for all levels. Our certified yoga instructors offer classes that focus on proper alignment, breathing techniques, and mindfulness to improve flexibility, strength, and mental wellbeing.

services.name: Web Development
services.description: Custom website design and development. Our talented web developers create responsive, user-friendly websites that look great on any device and help grow your online presence and business reach.

services.name: Language Lessons
services.description: Personalized language instruction in Spanish, French, Mandarin, and more. Our native-speaking tutors use an immersive approach to help you develop practical conversation skills and build confidence in your target language.

services.name: House Painting
services.description: Interior and exterior painting services. Our skilled painters use premium quality paints and materials to transform your space with expert preparation, meticulous application, and thorough cleanup.

bookings.comments: My laptop is running very slow, need a tune-up.
Recovering from knee surgery, need specialized attention.
Please bring equipment for hedge trimming as well.
Planning a party for 20 kids, need full service.
Leaking faucet in the master bathroom needs repair.
My dog is a golden retriever, very friendly but energetic.
Beginner level, looking for help with basic poses and relaxation techniques.
Need to discuss creating an e-commerce website for my small business.
Intermediate level Spanish, primarily need conversation practice.
Need two bedrooms painted, walls only. I have already purchased the paint.
Need help with algebra for high school student preparing for exams.
Two dogs need walking, a Labrador and a Beagle.
